item.title: Malware campaign 'DollyWay' breached 20,000 WordPress sites
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: A malware operation dubbed 'DollyWay' has been underway since 2016, compromising over 20,000 WordPress sites globally to redirect users to malicious sites. [...]

item.title: Kali Linux 2025.1a released with 1 new tool, annual theme refresh
item.dc:creator: Lawrence Abrams
item.description: Kali Linux has released version 2025.1a, the first version of 2025, with one new tool, desktop changes, and a theme refresh. [...]

item.title: Pennsylvania education union data breach hit 500,000 people
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: The Pennsylvania State Education Association (PSEA), the largest public-sector union in Pennsylvania, is notifying over half a million individuals that attackers stole their personal information in a July 2024 security breach. [...]

item.title: Ukrainian military targeted in new Signal spear-phishing attacks
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Ukraine's Computer Emergency Response Team (CERT-UA) is warning about highly targeted attacks employing compromised Signal accounts to send malware to employees of defense industry firms and members of the country's army forces. [...]

item.title: Microsoft Exchange Online outage affects Outlook web users
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: ​Microsoft is investigating an ongoing outage preventing Outlook on the web users from accessing their Exchange Online mailboxes. [...]

item.title: New Arcane infostealer infects YouTube, Discord users via game cheats
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: A newly discovered information-stealing malware called Arcane is stealing extensive user data, including VPN account credentials, gaming clients, messaging apps, and information stored in web browsers. [...]

item.title: Microsoft fixes Windows update bug that uninstalled Copilot
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Microsoft has fixed a bug causing the March 2025 Windows cumulative updates to mistakenly uninstall the AI-powered Copilot digital assistant from some Windows 10 and Windows 11 systems. [...]

item.title: Click Profit blocked by the FTC over alleged e-commerce scams
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: The US Federal Trade Commission (FTC) has taken action against the "Click Profit" business opportunity platform for allegedly earning $14 million while deceiving consumers with false promises of guaranteed passive income through online stores. [...]

item.title: WhatsApp patched zero-click flaw exploited in Paragon spyware attacks
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: WhatsApp has patched a zero-click, zero-day vulnerability used to install Paragon's Graphite spyware following reports from security researchers at the University of Toronto's Citizen Lab. [...]

item.title: Why it's time for phishing prevention to move beyond email
item.dc:creator: Sponsored by Push Security
item.description: While phishing has evolved, email security hasn't kept up. Attackers now bypass MFA & detection tools with advanced phishing kits, making credential theft harder to prevent. Learn how Push Security's browser-based security stops attacks as they happen. [...]

item.title: Sperm donation giant California Cryobank warns of a data breach
item.dc:creator: Lawrence Abrams
item.description: US sperm donor giant California Cryobank is warning customers it suffered a data breach that exposed customers' personal information. [...]

item.title: GitHub Action hack likely led to another in cascading supply chain attack
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: A cascading supply chain attack that began with the compromise of the "reviewdog/action-setup@v1" GitHub Action is believed to have led to the recent breach of "tj-actions/changed-files" that leaked CI/CD secrets. [...]

item.title: Western Alliance Bank notifies 21,899 customers of data breach
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Arizona-based Western Alliance Bank is notifying nearly 22,000 customers their personal information was stolen in October after a third-party vendor's secure file transfer software was breached. [...]
